text:
Vitagene (fastest growing DNA company) | Lead front-end | San Francisco (onsite)

Vitagene has 2 products: 1. Personal DNA health report. 2. Custom supplement subscription based on your results. Our growth is off the charts. We have all the cool algorithms on the back-end. Now we need to up our front-end game. Come helps us do that.

Small team, office in SOMA, market value comp, equity, unlimited vacation, free food on Thursdays.

https://vitagene.com/company/careers/
